body.p:
Louisville Ky 19th Octo 1863
Gen. J. M. Harlan
Dr. Sir
My commission as Notary Public expired about the time I was elected Clerk; and now, being out of the Clerkship, I desire a new commission. Will you do me the favor to ask Gov. Bramlette for it?
In any way that I can be of Service to you here command me at any time

Yours truly
Will R. Hervey
Jefferson Co
N. P.
W. R. Hervey
comd. 26th Oct/63

Mr Hervey is honest and well qualified, and loyal.
Harlan & Harlan
